Topic.Title: Remember to use IBM's max pain value, equals 200.00 for this week (exprires on Saturday)

Message.Msg: I'm into pain, as I'm nine of ten.

Message.Title: Decent report, price target raised, why are we stifled?
Message.Msg: IBM seems trapped at the $200 level! What will it take to get back to the $210+ area?

Topic.Title: Decent report, price target raised, why are we stifled?

Message.Msg: imho, its temporarily out of favor with institutions. A small runup occurred when announcements came and that squeezed every ounce of gains that it could make. It'll stay dorment for a while until the tech and computer services cycle resurfaces.

Topic.Title: Decent report, price target raised, why are we stifled?

Message.Msg: IBM moves with the market.(Some my think the market moves with IBM) Gains occur at major announcements. The last time at the 4Q stats. The next will be at 1Q stats or when a dividend increase or stock split is announced. After that it will again follow the markets.

Topic.Title: Why is Big Government, Big Deficit, Socialism so Popular in America Today?

Message.Msg: Americans used to have balls. Not anymore.
ok, i'd rather purchase stock of XIN during its recovery instead of being a fully recovered stock. thats an investor mentality. get onboard before the rest of wall street., not after.. go XIN..
